Well I found the russian vid is in complete, the original audio was better but incomplete aswell.
So here is what I did....

I first used the origianl audio that was upped for the majority of the vid,
but like I said it was only 1 hour and 46 min long, so from then on...
I went and grabbed the v2 audio that was released, and synced that to the last
part of the video...

I did not filter this audio or video...I was so sick of looking at it I firgured,
since I synced it, I would let someone else try and clean it up.

IMHO I think both audio's were not the best of quality, and for that matter
neither was the source video.

I only synced this because my good friend asked me to for his kids (anytime bro)
I also got alot of requests to sync it aswell.

If not for them I wouldn't even have touched this!!!!!
Well here it is complete atleast for the source video that we all had, and insync as far as I could see.

This was a real head ache to do....and all the sources involved were not very good, as I stated!
So please keep the complaints to a minimun....
